      Property Details for 824 S Ridgeley Dr

      Description provided by Trulia
      This is a Single-Family Home located at 824 South Ridgeley Drive, Los Angeles, CA. 824 S Ridgeley Dr has 3 beds, 1 bath, and approximately 2,112 square feet. The property has a lot size of 1 and was built in 1924. 824 S Ridgeley Dr is in the Miracle Mile neighborhood in Los Angeles, CA. The average list price for Miracle Mile is $1,104,800.

      Contact Info

      This is a Single-Family Home located at 824 S Ridgeley Dr, Los Angeles CA, 90036. 824 S Ridgeley Dr has has 3 beds, 1 bath, and approximately 2,112 square feet. The property has a lot size of 6,734 sqft and was built in 1924. 824 S Ridgeley Dr is in the Miracle Mile neighborhood in Los Angeles and in ZIP Code 90036. The average sale price for Miracle Mile sold homes is $936,666. The average sale price for 90036 sold homes is $1,484,500. The average sale price for Los Angeles sold homes is $758,851.
